The problem appears to be that unregisterNodeStore() forgets which registrations have already been processed. chetanm suggests something like:

private void unregisterNodeStore() {
    for (Registration r : registrations) {
        r.unregister();
    }
    registrations.clear();

    if (reg != null) {
        reg.unregister();
        reg = null;
    }

    if (mk != null) {
        mk.dispose();
        mk = null;
    }

    if (executor != null) {
        executor.stop();
        executor = null;
    }
}

I had a look at DocumentNodeStoreConfigTest.groovy but I don't see how I can test unregister here, or is it https://osgi.org/javadoc/r4v43/core/org/osgi/framework/ServiceRegistration.html#unregister%28%29?
